summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2923, for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Wallingford Division of Green Lake, being the alley between North 51st Street and North 52nd Street, from Woodlawn Avenue to Wallingford Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35317 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
